plugins.name: Little Bro
plugins.description:
Your Personal Design Mentor for Growth, Confidence, and Impact

Little Bro is the ultimate tool for designers who want to elevate their craft and make a real impact. Whether you're a junior designer, freelancer, or aspiring creative, Little Bro provides the mentorship and tools you need to thrive in your design journey.


  1. Instant Feedback on UX and Usability: Get real-time insights into your designs with usability simulations that help you identify pain points and improve user satisfaction.
  2. Accessibility Standards Made Simple: Ensure your designs are inclusive and meet accessibility standards effortlessly, making your work usable for everyone.
  3. Overcome Creative Blocks: Stay inspired and productive with strategies to spark creativity and keep your projects moving forward.
  4. Refine Your Presentation Skills: Learn to articulate your design decisions with clarity and confidence, helping you win over clients, teams, and stakeholders.
  5. Continuous Skill Development: With guidance refined by senior, staff, and director-level UI/UX and product designers, Little Bro helps you grow into the confident, skilled designer you aspire to be.


Little Bro is more than just a tool—it's your partner in mastering the art of UI/UX. From instant feedback to accessibility and usability insights, Little Bro is here to help you create designs that are not only beautiful but also functional and impactful.


Join a community of designers transforming their careers with Little Bro and unlock your full potential today.
plugins.tagline: A companion to help you design better, faster, and smarter

  2. Accessibility Standards Made Simple: Ensure your designs are inclusive and meet accessibility standards effortlessly, making your work usable for everyone.
  3. Overcome Creative Blocks: Stay inspired and productive with strategies to spark creativity and keep your projects moving forward.
  4. Refine Your Presentation Skills: Learn to articulate your design decisions with clarity and confidence, helping you win over clients, teams, and stakeholders.
  5. Continuous Skill Development: With guidance refined by senior, staff, and director-level UI/UX and product designers, Little Bro helps you grow into the confident, skilled designer you aspire to be.


Little Bro is more than just a tool—it's your partner in mastering the art of UI/UX. From instant feedback to accessibility and usability insights, Little Bro is here to help you create designs that are not only beautiful but also functional and impactful.


Join a community of designers transforming their careers with Little Bro and unlock your full potential today.

plugins.name: Guru Guides
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that delivers UX guidelines and customisable content, seamlessly integrating design system guides into Figma workflows.


Read the article


Guideline customisation

Connect Contentful to Guru Guides to customise guidelines for your organisation, tailoring them to specific projects, components, or patterns.


Watch the walkthrough


Default guidelines

Guru Guides offers default guidelines to help novice designers master modern web design by adopting essential components and best practices.


Benefits

Explore how consistent design principles enhance user experience, ensure brand alignment, and streamline team collaboration.
plugins.tagline: Customisable UX guidelines for Figma. Connect Contentful or use defaults to streamline design.

We’ve added a new Compositions section to the plugin!
This area showcases real-world examples of components in use — practical, contextual, and grounded in actual UI scenarios.

Use it to explore how components behave beyond variants and see them in action across different interface patterns.

plugins.name: Applink
plugins.description: Applink is a simple yet effective plugin that enhances collaboration in Figma by allowing users to copy and share local URLs instead of the standard Figma.com links. This ensures seamless navigation directly from the Figma app to the app, eliminating the detour through a browser. Perfect for teams, Applink streamlines the sharing process by saving time and simplifying workflows.
plugins.tagline: Effortless link sharing, straight from app to app

plugins.name: Turtles
plugins.description:
Turtles is a simple utility to that selects every layer under your selected layer. When working on mobile UI this is a cumbersome task. No more!


  1. Select a layer
  2. Run "Turtles"
  3. You're done! Everything below is selected ✌️
plugins.tagline: Select "All The Way Down

plugins.name: Session Marker
plugins.description:
Session Maker Like in the Skate video game series. Leave a work space and return without bounds. In my personal workflow I noticed that being able to navigate to a single component from a instance wasn't enough and often left me forgetting where i came from.


UI updates planned early 25" - This is a initial release for testing and feedback
plugins.tagline: Session Maker Like in the Skate video game series.

plugins.name: Mavity Figma Plugin
plugins.description: The plugin is a tailored tool designed to convert web pages into Figma designs with specific adjustments for seamless integration with Mavity. It works by using a Chrome extension to extract the structure and elements of a web page, converting them into a JSON format. This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
plugins.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

113549.name: Mavity Figma Plugin
113549.description: The plugin is a tailored tool designed to convert web pages into Figma designs with specific adjustments for seamless integration with Mavity. It works by using a Chrome extension to extract the structure and elements of a web page, converting them into a JSON format. This JSON is then processed by the plugin, which translates it into an editable design within Figma, ensuring compatibility and efficiency for Mavity workflows.
113549.tagline: Converts web pages to Figma designs using a Chrome extension and JSON transformation.

No need to download or switch tabs. Just type, click, and drop amazing visuals into your design in seconds!

plugins.name: АвтоГрамоты | AutoGramoty
plugins.description:
Зачем нужен?

Если ты устал заполнять кучу грамот-сертификатов-благодарностей вручную, то этот плагин спасет тебя.

Несколько нажатий вместо нескольких часов


Как пользоваться?

  1. Добавьте маркер в виде текста {{ФИО}} на фрейм
  2. Выделите весь фрейм
  3. Запустите АвтоГрамоты
  4. Введите текст маркера
  5. Введите значения
  6. Нажмите "Создать"


Предложения принимаются в личке


How to use?

  1. Add a marker in the form of text {{KEY} to the frame
  2. Select the entire frame
  3. Launch AutoGramoty
  4. Enter the marker text
  5. Enter the values
  6. Click "Create"
plugins.tagline: Устал делать кучу грамот? Плагин решит твою проблему!

137420.name: АвтоГрамоты | AutoGramoty
137420.description:
Зачем нужен?

Если ты устал заполнять кучу грамот-сертификатов-благодарностей вручную, то этот плагин спасет тебя.

Несколько нажатий вместо нескольких часов


Как пользоваться?

  1. Добавьте маркер в виде текста {{ФИО}} на фрейм
  2. Выделите весь фрейм
  3. Запустите АвтоГрамоты
  4. Введите текст маркера
  5. Введите значения
  6. Нажмите "Создать"


Предложения принимаются в личке


How to use?

  1. Add a marker in the form of text {{KEY} to the frame
  2. Select the entire frame
  3. Launch AutoGramoty
  4. Enter the marker text
  5. Enter the values
  6. Click "Create"
137420.release_notes:
🤓Йоу, первое большое обновление:

- Переработан концепт: теперь вы сами указываете текстовые маркеры и их может быть
н е с к о л ь к о
- Обновлен дизайн
- Можно управлять сеткой
- Добавлена инструкция

🤯И самое главное:

- Скорость работы увеличена в десятки раз благодаря оптимизации.
Теперь работает моментально, попробуйте
137420.tagline: Устал делать кучу грамот? Плагин решит твою проблему!

plugins.name: Simple Ruler
plugins.description:
📐 四辺定規システム

  1. パネルの上下左右すべての辺に精密な目盛りを表示
  2. ピクセル単位での正確な測定が可能


🔍 自動ズーム対応

  1. Figmaのズーム率変化をリアルタイム検知
  2. ズーム率に応じて目盛り間隔を自動調整
  3. 常に実際のピクセル値を正確に表示
  4. ズーム率表示の場合は、クリックすることでデザインデータを等倍に


📏 リサイズ機能

  1. 8方向のリサイズハンドル（四隅 + 各辺中央）
  2. ドラッグ操作で自由にサイズ変更可能
  3. リサイズ中も目盛りがリアルタイム更新
  4. 邪魔にならないように、折りたたんで端に寄せることが可能（最小化／展開）


📊 情報表示パネル

  1. 現在のサイズを「幅 XXXpx × 高さ XXXpx」形式で表示
  2. ズーム率を「実寸大」「ズーム率 XXX%」形式で表示
plugins.tagline: プラグインウインドウでデザインデータ内のオブジェクトのサイズを直感的に計測できます。

138193.release_notes: デザインデータがズームされた状態の場合、SImple Ruler内のズーム率の表記箇所をクリックすれば、デザインデータを等倍にできるようになりました。
138193.tagline: プラグインウインドウでデザインデータ内のオブジェクトのサイズを直感的に計測できます。

plugins.name: Wave Design Token Exporter
plugins.description:
The Design Token Exporter plugin allows designers and developers to easily export Figma's local styles and variables into a clean, structured JSON format.


Export color, text, and effect styles


Export all variable collections and modes


Choose between "Variables" or "Styles" before exporting


Copy JSON or download it for use in your design system


Perfect for integrating with codebases using tokens in Tailwind, Style Dictionary, or design systems

plugins.tagline: Export Figma styles and variables as design tokens in JSON format.

plugins.name: GIF Boss
plugins.description:
Bring your designs to life with GIF Boss — the ultimate Figma plugin for creating powerful, customisable GIFs in seconds. Select a series of frames and transform them into smooth, high-quality animations with full control over:

  1. Timing & Looping – Set frame durations and loop styles with ease
  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality
  4. Bulk Creation – Generate several GIFs simultaneously. Ideal for large campaign roll-outs with multiple animated banner ads of different dimensions
plugins.tagline: Simultaneous multi GIF generation.

136516.name: GIF Boss
136516.description:
Bring your designs to life with GIF Boss — the ultimate Figma plugin for creating powerful, customisable GIFs in seconds. Select a series of frames and transform them into smooth, high-quality animations with full control over:

  1. Timing & Looping – Set frame durations and loop styles with ease
  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality
  4. Bulk Creation – Generate several GIFs simultaneously. Ideal for large campaign roll-outs with multiple animated banner ads of different dimensions

plugins.name: Detach variables
plugins.description:
Detacher – Take Full Control Over Figma Variables

Tired of wasting time manually detaching variables in Figma?

Detacher is your all-in-one utility to scan, preview, and detach variables from your selection — quickly, cleanly, and confidently.


✅ What Makes Detacher Better?


🔍 Visual Variable Summary

Get an instant snapshot of all the variables in your selection — Colors, Text, Numbers, Others — with live counts for total clarity.


🎯 Smart Selection Control

Choose exactly what to detach using simple checkboxes:

✔ Colors

✔ Text

✔ Numbers

✔ Others


🅰️ Full Typography Support

Detach all typography-related variables — including mixed styles and both string- and number-based properties


⚙️ How It Works

  1. Select your frame, group, or section in Figma.
  2. Launch the Detacher plugin.
  3. Pick the variable types you want to detach.
  4. (Optional) Preview changes.
  5. Hit Detach Variables → Done.


👩‍💻 Who Is Detacher For?

  1. Figma Power Users who want deeper control over variables.
  2. Design Engineers & Dev Designers looking to streamline their cleanup workflows.
  3. DesignOps & UI Librarians maintaining clean, scalable systems.
  4. Hackathon Designers & Makers who work fast and need instant variable resets.
  5. Anyone tired of manually detaching variables one by one.


🌱 Support the Creator


Built for the community — shaped by your feedback.

We’re constantly testing edge cases and adding features, but bugs can happen.

If you find one, reach out and help make Detacher better.

✨ More powerful features are already in the works.
plugins.tagline: Detach differnet types of variables in a frame safely and effortlessly  !

plugins.name: Swap Dimensions
plugins.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

136052.name: Swap Dimensions
136052.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
136052.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

plugins.name: HarmonyType - Typography & Color System Generator
plugins.description: A screen-optimized typography system based on modular scale theory, golden ratio proportions, and optical adjustments for perfect text hierarchy across all devices.

plugins.name: Expression Blast
plugins.description:
As humans we feel. As humans we express.

We experience emotions like hunger, hangovers, confusion, or surprise. As designers especially, we often forget to eat, choosing instead to perfect one more button variation or tweak the kerning just a bit more—at the cost of sleep.

We feel so many things, yet have so few outlets to express them—whether we're collaborating with teammates or simply needing a small boost of joy. That’s why I created Expression Blast: a plugin that gives designers a playful way to express the real, everyday emotions we all experience.
plugins.tagline: An Outlet for Everyday Emotions.

plugins.name: Section Auto-Resize with 200px Margin
plugins.description:
This plugin automatically resizes Figma Sections to fit their content and adds a 200px margin around the content area. It's designed to help teams maintain consistent spacing and layout rules without manually adjusting section boundaries.


Perfect for teams working with grid systems, spacing standards, or design system alignment workflows.
plugins.tagline: Auto-resize sections and apply consistent 200px margin padding.

plugins.name: GPT to Canvas
plugins.description: This plugin helps to plot e.g. tables from chatGPT research on to your Figma or FigJam canvas to be able to overcome chat interface limitations and spatially distribute information quickly especially on lengthy brainstorms. The plugin uses the OpenAI API and requires your personal OpenAI API Key.
plugins.tagline: Plot chatGPT research on canvas

plugins.name: Disable "Clip content"
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
plugins.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

133693.name: Disable "Clip content"
133693.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
133693.release_notes:
– Improved logging: the path to each modified clipsContent node is now printed in a structured, readable format with icons.
– Skipped clipsContent updates for INSTANCE nodes to avoid errors.
133693.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

plugins.name: Variant Randomizer
plugins.description:
Tired of manually clicking through component variants one by one just to create visual variety in your mockups? Variant Randomizer is here to help! This simple yet powerful Figma plugin lets you instantly randomize the variants applied to multiple selected components or instances that have more than one variant option.


How it Works:

Select multiple elements (components/instances) on your canvas.

Run the [Plugin Name] plugin.

Done! The plugin automatically assigns a random variant to each selected element that has multiple variants available. Elements with only one variant or no variants will be ignored.


Why use Variant Randomizer?

Save Valuable Time: Stop the tedious process of manually changing variants across many elements.

Create Realistic Mockups: Quickly add natural variation to lists, grids, user avatars, button states, icons, and more.

Boost Productivity: Perfect for working with design systems and large sets of components.

Simple & Fast: One-click operation after selection.

Works on Selection: Target only the elements you need to change.



You can help me mantain this plugin by Buying me a coffee!
plugins.tagline: nstantly randomize component variants across your selection.

plugins.name: Quick Navigator
plugins.description:
Quick Navigator is a lightweight yet powerful plugin designed to help you stay oriented while working on large or complex Figma files. Instead of endlessly zooming and panning around, this plugin gives you a miniature view of your entire canvas thus making it easier than ever to find what you're looking for.


Features:

  1. See all your frames and sections in a simplified, scrollable mini window.
  2. Tap on any visible frame or section in the mini view to instantly select and focus it on the main canvas.
  3. Ideal when you're moving fast, experimenting, or managing chaotic canvases, no need for everything to be clean or structured.


NOTE: Currently, SVG shapes and text layers are not included in the mini view.
plugins.tagline: Never get lost on the canvas again!

131062.name: Quick Navigator

NOTE: Currently, SVG shapes and text layers are not included in the mini view.
131062.tagline: Never get lost on the canvas again!

plugins.name: Randomize
plugins.description:
How it Works:


Select Text Layers: Choose one or more text layers on your Figma canvas that you want to modify.


Open Randomize: Run the Randomize plugin.


Enter Your Items: In the input field, type or paste the different text strings you want to use, making sure each item is separated by a comma (,). For example: John Doe, Jane Smith, Alex Johnson, Maria Garcia


Click Randomize: Press the "Randomize" button.


See the Magic: The plugin will instantly replace the content of each selected text layer with a randomly selected item from the list you provided.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly populate selected text layers with random content from your custom list.

129638.name: Randomize
129638.description:
How it Works:


Select Text Layers: Choose one or more text layers on your Figma canvas that you want to modify.


Open Randomize: Run the Randomize plugin.


Enter Your Items: In the input field, type or paste the different text strings you want to use, making sure each item is separated by a comma (,). For example: John Doe, Jane Smith, Alex Johnson, Maria Garcia


Click Randomize: Press the "Randomize" button.


See the Magic: The plugin will instantly replace the content of each selected text layer with a randomly selected item from the list you provided.
129638.tagline: Effortlessly populate selected text layers with random content from your custom list.

plugins.name: Sticky Note Maker
plugins.description:
Sticky Note Maker

Effortlessly add colorful sticky notes to your Figma designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, and organizing ideas.


Key Features:

- Create sticky notes next to any selected frame (top-right) or centered in the viewport.

- Choose from 5 types: Note (blue), Fresh Idea (pink), Approved (green), Need Attention (yellow), Need Fix (red).

- Automatically includes your name and timestamp for easy tracking.

- Simple, icon-driven interface with color-coded hover and selection states.


How to Use:

1. Select a frame (or none for viewport placement).

2. Pick a sticky note type from the icon buttons.

3. Write your note and click "Create".


Ideal for designers, teams, and anyone who loves a visual way to comment and collaborate. Streamline your workflow with Sticky Note Maker!
plugins.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

How to Use:

Ideal for designers, teams, and anyone who loves a visual way to comment and collaborate. Streamline your workflow with Sticky Note Maker!
126253.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

plugins.name: Preview Card Creator
plugins.description:
Overview

Create a preview card from selected frames. The card contains images generated from the frames and a link back to the original Figma file allowing for easy navigation.


Why use this?

  1. Got summary or overview pages? This is useful for deeper linking into specific pages without having to be familiar with the file.
  2. Got a centralized file that contains the whole application? Stop the file from getting large by replacing full flows with a preview card that deep links to individual Figma files.
plugins.tagline: Create preview cards for summary or overview pages

125915.name: Preview Card Creator
125915.description:

  2. Got a centralized file that contains the whole application? Stop the file from getting large by replacing full flows with a preview card that deep links to individual Figma files.
125915.tagline: Create preview cards for summary or overview pages

plugins.name: Arreglo
plugins.description:
https://arreglo.ai


Arreglo is a Figma plugin that helps music producers visualize song arrangements. Using AI with semantic pattern recognition, it generates musically intelligent arrangements based on your instrument patterns and track names, making it easy to plan and understand song structures.
plugins.tagline: Finish tracks faster with AI generated arrangement ideas!

plugins.name: DATVM
plugins.description:
DATVM makes it simple to inject realistic and varied data directly into your Figma designs, saving you time and keeping your mockups authentic.


100+ Built-in Datasets

Choose from a wide range of pre-populated categories.


Customizable Lists

Create and manage your own custom lists to perfectly match your project's specific needs.


Sort & Randomize

Sort data alphabetically, by length, or randomize for unique content every time.


Number Formatting

Format numbers with precision. Control decimal places, separators, currency symbols, and percentage variations.


Date Formatting

Easily format dates with customizable separators and order.


Bookmarks

Save your favorite lists for quick and easy access.


How it Works

  1. Select the text layers you want to populate.
  2. Open DATVM.
  3. Choose a data category from the available lists or select a custom list.
  4. Customize formatting options.
  5. Click to populate the selected layers with data.
plugins.tagline: Finest Data Populator

122333.description:
